name: 蔡佩芳
objective:
本課程旨在針對營運模式與供應鏈管理作探討, 其中包含: 1.電子化企業概論2.經營模式3.企業再造4.企業資源管理5.中小企業電子化6.商業電子化7.供應鏈管理8.需求鏈管理9.協同預測管理10.個案研究。
The purpose of the course is to discuss the business model and supply chain management. The contents of this course will include: 1. General concept of e-business management 2.The business model3. Business reengineering 4.Enterprise resource planning 5.Small enterprise e-business management6. Channel e-business 7.Supply chain management 8.Demand chain manage-ment9.Collaborative management10. Case Study.
